content.raw:
works great when I tried it.  One minor request, could we make the range larger?
~~~
setRange(-10000.0, 10000.0)
~~~
or even make them unlimited?  The joint angles are allowed to wrap more then 2PI as some robots have larger than 2PI joint limits, so it might be good to remove the +/-360 constraint here too.
